description:
SpeedX 3D for Nintendo 3DS is a
stunning tunnel racer that tests a
player's skill and transports him or her
into a trance filled with great
electronic music and hypnotic
graphics. SpeedX 3D offers four game
modes introducing the player to more
and more challenging places at a
speed that increases with every
second. The question is: how far can
the player go without losing
concentration?
name: SpeedX 3D
